Text.Page:
Victory is in our reach, and we can do nothing about the enemies lurking in our path. We're stuck here, waiting to advance, while the {@LinkCreature:25#1011#devan reavers} pick us off.

Help us make way by killing those you can catch. It should take you no time at all, and you can catch up to Elleon's party when you're finished.
Great job! Those scouts have to fall backâ€”now they can see what they're really up against. We'll be able to catch up with the advance party in the cathedral!
If you can't take out more of those {@LinkCreature:25#1011#devan reavers}, we can't advance.
